rows.label: tev072301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_SEL0011
rows.name:
Ask Sin'luarb why the Ganglion
are so obsessed with humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Sin'luarb about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Sin'luarb about life in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0001
rows.name:
It is certainly true that the Ganglion—and particularly
Goetia—had a very strange reaction whenever the
subject of humans came up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0002
rows.name:
When they were tormenting we Orphe, they always
seemed to be doing it for their own amusement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0003
rows.name:
But their attitude toward humans was much more
serious. I don't know quite how to describe the way
they feel about you, for I don't understand it myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0004
rows.name:
But it's something closer to hatred.
Something truly deep and primal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0007
rows.name:
Sen'luarb seems to have inherited Kun'luarb's Ovah
more strongly than I.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0008
rows.name: He possesses numerous memories that I do not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0009
rows.name:
When I am unsure how to proceed, I find it best to
speak with him and work together to find the most
beneficial path.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0010
rows.name:
I should thank you for acquiring the senirapa water
that we Orphe—and especially Kun'luarb—had sought
for so long. You have our gratitude.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0020
rows.name:
I have taken a job at a type of business known as a
"restaurant" in the commercial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0021
rows.name:
They gave me a position as a "cook."
My duty is to make high-quality salads for Orpheans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0022
rows.name:
I understand that you humans have a tendency to eat
insufficient quantities of vegetables.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0023
rows.name:
But now that I am a cook, I assure you that I will do
what I can to remedy that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0024
rows.name:
One day I'd like to make a satisfying human meal so
that you can also experience the joys of plant life![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0011
rows.name:
Are you familiar with the red offspring that we Orphe
sometimes produce during division?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0012
rows.name:
We've taken to calling them "betaforms."
They almost seem to be an entirely different species
from the usual alphaforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0013
rows.name:
They laugh. They become sad and angry.
They sometimes even yell completely irrational things![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0014
rows.name:
It has already begun to have an effect on our collective
judgment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072301_MSG0015
rows.name:
I do not know how we should proceed. Even Sen'luarb,
who is usually able to find a clear answer for difficult
problems, merely says the situation is "incalculable."[ST:wait ]
